# Question 1
```{r}
here::i_am("test_grades.Rproj")
library(here)
library(vroom)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)

grades <- read.csv(here("grades.csv"))
```
# Question 2

The data set contains `r NROW(grades)` grades.


# Question 3

```{r}
n_students <- grades |>
  distinct(id) |>
  nrow()
```

There are `r n_students` students in the data set.


# Question 4

```{r}
students <- grades |>
  distinct(id, group) |>
  arrange(id)
students |>
  slice_sample(n=5) |>
  knitr::kable()
```
